column1: Marhari is a Gothic name meaning horse-soldier. The first element is related to English "mare" (see mearas).
column2: Note 6 The second  element -hari is a simplified version of Gothic -harya "armyman
column3: warrior" (seen also in Vinitharya) to indicate a later age.
